survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee participation levels, satisfaction, and suggestions for improving the corporate wellness program.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate wellness program activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure the options cover all possible participation levels.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate wellness program activities?

questions.question_text: Which wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness activities offered?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness activities offered?

questions.question_text: What motivates you to participate in the wellness program?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with an optional open-ended option for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What motivates you to participate in the wellness program?

questions.question_text: Have you noticed any positive changes in your health or well-being due to the wellness program?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure perceived impact. Include a 'Not applicable' option for non-participants.

script.question_text: Have you noticed any positive changes in your health or well-being due to the wellness program?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more in the wellness program?
answer_options: Activities not relevant to my interests
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with an optional open-ended option for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more in the wellness program?
answer_options: Activities not relevant to my interests
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: How could the wellness program be improved to better meet your needs?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: How could the wellness program be improved to better meet your needs?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the wellness program to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the wellness program to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What additional wellness activities would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather suggestions for new activities.

script.question_text: What additional wellness activities would you like to see offered?

questions.question_text: How convenient are the timings of the wellness activities for your schedule?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure convenience. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How convenient are the timings of the wellness activities for your schedule?
